actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Wheat, Soybeans, and Feed Grains

official_title: A bill to provide soybean producers with the same protection from natural disasters as producers of wheat and feed grains.

summary.text: Makes 1983 soybean producers eligible for compensation, in the case of prevented plantings or failure to harvest normal crop acreage because of a natural disaster, at rates comparable to those received by producers of feed grains and wheat under the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1949.

titles.title: A bill to provide soybean producers with the same protection from natural disasters as producers of wheat and feed grains.
